title: Bug 120315: Display property 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the label is still visible.
EB: The label should disappear when the display property is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Add a label.
2. Open the 'properties' view.
3. Set the sectionDisplay property of the label to 'none' in the properties view.
